FuncDef: This command configures the thresholds for raising the CPU alarm. The low threshold value must be configured with a smaller value than the high threshold.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the high threshold value, as a percentage. Values-1 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Specifies the low threshold value, as a percentage. Values-0 to 99. ParamDefault: Default- 0
